name: Return Loss Antenna Supervision
summary: The feature detects breaks in the cables connected to radio units by measuring return loss as

parameters.name: FreqBandData.vswrSupervisionActive
parameters.description: The value of the attribute must be set to                 true to enable the feature.

parameters.name: FreqBandData.vswrSupervisionSensitivity
parameters.description: The desired supervision sensitivity must be set as the value             of the attribute.

parameters.name: RfPort.administrativeState
parameters.description: The VSWR Over Threshold alarm is only raised             if the value of the attribute is set to UNLOCKED.

parameters.name: RfPort.vswrSupervisionActive
parameters.description: The value of the attribute must be set to                 true to enable the feature.

parameters.name: RfPort.vswrSupervisionSensitivity
parameters.description: The desired supervision sensitivity must be set as the value             of the attribute.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012024 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012024 MO instance.
